description:
Wordpress Tutorials for absolute beginners, technophobes and people just wanting the low down on the best website creation tool on the planet!

The course is delivered via 22 video lessons, each lesson contains a task for you to do build your first website.

There is approximately 5 hours of videos to watch, and the tasks take on average between 15 minutes and 40 minutes to complete.

If you are an entrepreneur, small business owner or just want to get on the ladder for marketing on the internet then this is a great place to start with learning Wordpress.
title: Wordpress Nailed In 21 Days
